Text: thank you so much JanOve2011 for the naxos serie in lossless format.
gege06: Glad you like it, and thank you for taking time to comment :)

me too, thanks
had a problem with bach and strauss playing on my ipod classic, but re-encoded them and all is well.
Thanks again for all of this. 
Another pro-tip, I changed the album artwork to better pics of these geniuses, because the cartoonish depictions of them on the original albums didn't work for me....
Cheers

1subgenius: hehe I hear what you say about the original covers, but I stick with them to keep track between the various compilations. I do not however "enjoy" when David Garrett shows up at my mediacentre, so his covers I always change no matter what :) Anyhow, glad you like the albums and good that you got the device playing them. Hope you did not hit and run.
